pages.text: The Charcoal Pit is a device that converts logs and wood blocks into charred wood. When broken, charred wood will drop charcoal and the amount will bed based on the quality of wood that was converted. The Charcoal Pit will search in a radius as defined by the config. Multiple pits can be stacked (up to a height defined in the config) and will convert logs at all y-levels.

For a log to be converted, it must be covered on all six sides by a solid block. Log blocks also have to be connected to the charcoal pit through other log blocks. $(mechanics/fire)Lighting$() a pit will light all pits in a vertical column.
